name: B2BGateway
description:
B2BGateway is a global, cloud based, fully-integrated EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) solutions provider and has been providing EDI solutions to NetSuite users since 2001, back when NetSuite was known as Net Ledger. With offices in North America, Europe and a sister office in Europe, B2BGateway offers 24/7 support andÂ can handle all internationally recognized EDI standards and communication protocols such as X12, EDIFACT, Eancom, Tradacoms, XML, VAN, AS2, FTP, and many, many more.
B2BGateway's integrated EDI solutions remove the need to re-key data thus allowing organizations to reduce labor costs, reduce errors and hasten the 'order to payment' cash cycle.
